overview:
Collin started his career in IT Strategy consulting. With a flair for entrepreneurship, Collin went on to build both an adventure travel business as well as a local advertising network. Currently, Collin is a venture capitalist at Correlation Ventures.

Collin has an Honors Finance degree from Southern Methodist University as well as an MBA from the Kellogg School of Management with an emphasis on Innovation & Entrepreneurship and Finance.

An avid competitor, Collin spends his free time taking on adventure races (national champion), Crossfit competitions, and blogging about the venture industry. Collin and his team of four are filming a full-length documentary covering their first-ever expedition across the Arctic Ocean by rowboat in July 2012 (www.ArcticRow.com).

Collin and wife, Sunni, live in San Francisco.
